name: Year·Violent Violet
description: A pet dye popular during the Spring Festival, seemingly it can be used on Year..

name: Yellow Clothing Dye
description: It can dye clothing materials yellow.

name: Yellow Drooping Cat
description: Doll that can put on the head to carry around. You will hear cat's sound and feel there's a cat moving on your head. But it's just imagination.

name: Yellow Drooping Cat [1]
description: Doll that can put on the head to carry around. You will hear cat's sound and feel there's a cat moving on your head. But it's just imagination.

name: Yellow Drooping Cat [1] Blueprint
description: Doll that can put on the head to carry around. You will hear cat's sound and feel there's a cat moving on your head. But it's just imagination.

name: Yellow Herb
description: A raw material for producing yellow hair dyes.

name: Yellow Live
description: A small green ore. It has earth attribute and can be made into Great Nature after extraction.

name: Yellow Potion
description: Potion made from crushed yellow herbs. Use it to restore 245-300 points of HP.

name: Yggdrasil Berry
description: A leaf of Yggdrasil which created the world, it has a bewilderingly fresh taste and unexpected effects on the body. It can instantly restore all HP. If used during PVP, the HP Regen will reduce and CD time will be longer.

name: Yggdrasil Dew Drop
description: Falling from the waving wings of elemental elves, the light dust fell on the ordinary cards and then brought them strong affinity power. The power can be injected into the adventurer's soul through the power of Valkyrie, which will make adventurers preferred by elements.

name: You are Falling
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [Actually, Phreeoni is pretty cute, Isn't he?]

name: Yoyo Doll
description: A doll designed like Monster Yoyo, a group animal living in deep forest. Cute and smart, the monster is extremely adored by women and children. It permanently increases the character's Flee by 10 points and cannot be traded.

name: Yoyo Tail Blueprint
description: Monster Yoyo's tail Can be purchased from the collectors.

name: Yula's Treasure Chest
description: "Thank you for helping the Goblins! I'd like you to take a look at this... This wizard has gathered a hoard of treasure over the years.” The great wizard Yula quietly calls you aside and brings her treasure chest out from the depths of the storeroom.
